All Classes

Class Summary
Class
Description
ArrayMethods
Array Method Class The class is used manage arrays Methods in this class are used to append new values to an existing array These methods create a new array, duplicate the values of the existing array and returns the new array with the added value on the last index of the new array
DateMethods
Date Method Class The class contains methods use to set a valid date or confirm if a date is past a specified date
InputMethods
Input Method Class The class is used to pass methods to request valid input input is then handled along with potential errors
Person
Person Class The class is used manage personnel contact information Each parameter of the person class stores an array to allow for multiple accounts New entries are appended to the end of each array at the last index value Each account is assigned an account number and address id automatically to allow search methods to locate the same account even if details on that account are changed
Project
Project Class The class is used manage project information Each parameter of the project class stores an array to allow for project details New entries are appended to the end of each array at the last index value Each project is automatically assigned as false for for finalized Similarly each project is assigned a completions date after being completed
ProjectManagementSystem
Project Management System Class The class is the main class used to call methods and other classes to create the project management system The class loads the parameters of Project and Person classes and then continues to loop until the user cancels
SaveDataIO
Saved Data IO Class The methods from this are used read and write saved data from .txt files
